Articles.Content:
As I recall there was a mod that improved the process of game saving and loading but can't find it now.

The functionality I'm looking for is at least to have savegames sorted by creation time in the list to load. Having time displayed near a save's name would also be nice.

Does anyone remember its name? I don't mind if it's outdated, just lazy to get into it myself because I have plenty of my own stuff to work on now.
As far as I know the scope of CraftHistory is keeping information about vessel design but I need a mod that manages saved games, just the way they are displayed.

Oh saved games, not craft files. You could always [put your saved games on Dropbox](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=259581627&insideModal=1) (or other cloud service) which will [automatically save each revision](https://www.dropbox.com/en/help/11)

> 
> Oh saved games, not craft files. You could always [put your saved games on Dropbox](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=259581627&insideModal=1) (or other cloud service) which will [automatically save each revision](https://www.dropbox.com/en/help/11)

This isn't the thing either. I want the more convenient way to save/load, not more pain ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

How about [Dated QuickSaves](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107663-1-0-x-Magico13-s-Modlets-%28Field-Experience-Sensible-Screenshot-etc-%29)? doesn't tick all the boxes, but at least it's a bit easier to work with than 'quicksave #'
